thread.title: Devin Robinson: Isaiah Briscoe called Gators soft
thread.title_full: Devin Robinson: Isaiah Briscoe called Gators soft

title: Devin Robinson: Isaiah Briscoe called Gators soft
text:
Devin Robinson: Isaiah Briscoe called Gators soft Florida's Devin Robinson says Kentucky guard Isaiah Briscoe called them soft. Then the Gators won 88-66. Slot to 247Sports Links 
This is an example of trash talk that had the opposite effect that the agitator wanted. 
After Florida blew out Kentucky on Saturday night, Gators forward Devin Robinson told reporters that Kentucky guard Isaiah Briscoe called them soft early in the matchup. 
Florida's Devin Robinson said Isaiah Briscoe called the Gators soft early in the game. He said beating UK was important to prove capability. — Fletcher Page (@FletcherPage) February 5, 2017 
Florida had just an eight-point lead at halftime. The Wildcats still trailed by seven at the 15:31 mark of the second half, but they would never get closer. The Gators controlled the latter half en route to an 88-66 victory. Florida finished with a 54-29 advantage in rebounds, including 17 offensive boards. 
On this night, Kentucky looked like the soft team. Author
